Description

The Skahal Studios is an indie game development company.

History

Created in 2011 by Diego Giacomelli and Giusepe Casagrande, they start their journey with Ships N' Battles, a revamped battleship game with multiplayer between iOS, MacOs and Android devices.

With over 500.000 downloads, Ships N' Battles was a great start.

Projects

  • Ships N' Battles
